item.title: But actually, what is dust?
item.description: A table is table, a chair is a chair, and a lamp is, indeed, a lamp. At least from a broad perspective. You are also describing a lamp when saying “an illuminating device, generally composed of a stand and a bulb” The stand and the bulb are as much lamp as the object itself, but at the same time, completely different entities. The whole world is built by these types of constructions.
